The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 02 August is 57,392 (6,642.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 28 July, there were 2,108 new confirmed cases (244.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 July, there were 4,017 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 48% (1,909 fewer cases).
